abstract: Prominent Orthodox Rabbi Barry Freundel pleads guilty to 52 counts of voyeurism, admitting that he videotaped roughly 150 nude women over many years in changing room of a Jewish ritual bath; Freundel had been at Kesher Israel synagogue in Washington, DC, for more than 25 years prior to his arrest.
lead_paragraph: A prominent Orthodox rabbi acknowledged Thursday that for years he videotaped women in a changing room of a Jewish ritual bath, recording about 150 nude women.
snippet: A prominent Orthodox rabbi acknowledged Thursday that for years he videotaped women in a changing room of a Jewish ritual bath, recording about 150 nude women.
